name: UNNotificationSound
desc: The sound played upon delivery of a notification.

items.name: class var `default`: UNNotificationSound
items.desc: Returns an object representing the default sound for notifications.

items.name: init(named: UNNotificationSoundName)
items.desc: Creates a sound object that represents a custom sound file.

items.name: class var defaultCritical: UNNotificationSound
items.desc: The default sound used for critical alerts.

items.name: class func defaultCriticalSound(withAudioVolume: Float) -> Self
items.desc: Creates a sound object that plays the default critical alert sound at the volume you specify.

items.name: class func criticalSoundNamed(UNNotificationSoundName) -> Self
items.desc: Creates a custom sound object for critical alerts.

items.name: class func criticalSoundNamed(UNNotificationSoundName, withAudioVolume: Float) -> Self
items.desc: Creates a custom sound object for critical alerts with the volume you specify.
